channel.title: Fernanda Meira's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Fernanda Meira's Blog

item.title: Web Design vs. APP Design
item.description: There are differences in designing for websites and applications, and this should totally influence your thinking and projects development.As both can be created using similar principles, the same tools and languages, we need to be carefull and don’t mix the objectives of each one of them.
